Main — Hair Catalogue — Bulk
Bulk

Freedom. This is why our clients prefer bulk extensions. Indeed, your style isn’t carved in stone. Be charming. Be playsome. Be splendid. Impress and mesmerise. How’d you do that? It’s up to you now!

The choice of lengths and volumes is not limited with some particular attachment way, so these bulk Slavic hair extensions fit just any head or hair type equally well. Bring these extra-durable, finely selected bulk hair extensions to your hair stylist and enjoy volumous Russian hair with whatever extension type you prefer.

Gently died and coloured using a 6-stage process, these hair feature natural shades and retain vivid look for much longer than your typical hair extension. And there’re almost entangle-free as each bundle consists of 99% non-inverted, root-to-tip same length hair. This also allows for truly silky look and feel of your hair, because, naturally, Russian hair extensions don’t need no any silicone or acid treatment for smoothness.

Bulk hair is a nice option if you feel creative or just love having some extra freedom never sticking to specific integration methods. The pack comes in a branded box in 2-3 days if in stock or in 8-10 days if out of stock. Order Russian hair bundle at Elizé!
